mapper.select:
/* [com.coway.trust.biz.logistics.adjustment.impl.CountStockAuditMapper.selectCountStockAuditListExcel] 20191007 - KR OHK */
ORDER BY A.STOCK_AUDIT_NO DESC

/* [com.coway.trust.biz.logistics.adjustment.impl.CountStockAuditMapper.selectStockAuditDocInfo] 20191014 - KR OHK */ SELECT A.STOCK_AUDIT_NO ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.DOC_START_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'DD/MM/YYYY') DOC_START_DT ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.DOC_END_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'DD/MM/YYYY') DOC_END_DT ,A.DOC_STUS_CODE_ID ,E.CODE_NAME DOC_STUS_NM ,A.REUPLOAD_YN ,A.STOCK_AUDIT_REASON ,A.LOC_TYPE ,A.LOC_STK_GRAD ,A.CTGRY_TYPE ,A.ITM_TYPE ,A.REM ,A.USE_YN ,A.SERIAL_CHK_YN ,A.CRT_USER_ID ,C.USER_NAME CRT_USER_NM ,TO_CHAR(A.CRT_DT, 'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI') CRT_DT ,A.UPD_USER_ID ,D.USER_NAME UPD_USER_NM ,TO_CHAR(A.UPD_DT, 'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI') UPD_DT ,B.LOC_STUS_CODE_ID ,F.CODE_NAME LOC_STUS_NM ,CASE WHEN B.LOC_STUS_CODE_ID IN (5689, 5691, 5713) THEN NULL ELSE B.ATCH_FILE_GRP_ID END ATCH_FILE_GRP_ID ,B.WH_LOC_ID ,B.APPV_1_REQST_USER_ID ,G.USER_NAME APPV_1_REQST_USER_NM ,TO_CHAR(B.APPV_1_REQST_DT, 'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI') APPV_1_REQST_DT ,B.APPV_1_USER_ID ,H.USER_NAME APPV_1_USER_NM ,TO_CHAR(B.APPV_1_DT, 'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI') APPV_1_DT ,B.APPV_1_OPINION ,B.APPV_2_USER_ID ,I.USER_NAME APPV_2_USER_NM ,TO_CHAR(B.APPV_2_DT, 'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI') APPV_2_DT ,B.APPV_2_OPINION ,A.APPV_3_USER_ID ,J.USER_NAME APPV_3_USER_NM ,TO_CHAR(A.APPV_3_DT, 'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI') APPV_3_DT ,A.APPV_3_OPINION ,TO_CHAR(B.UPD_DT, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') UPD_DT_TIME FROM LOG0094M A JOIN LOG0095M B ON B.STOCK_AUDIT_NO = A.STOCK_AUDIT_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN SYS0047M C ON C.USER_ID = A.CRT_USER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SYS0047M D ON D.USER_ID = A.UPD_USER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SYS0013M E ON E.CODE_ID = A.DOC_STUS_CODE_ID AND E.CODE_MASTER_ID = '436' LEFT OUTER JOIN SYS0013M F ON F.CODE_ID = B.LOC_STUS_CODE_ID AND F.CODE_MASTER_ID = '437' LEFT OUTER JOIN SYS0047M G ON G.USER_ID = B.APPV_1_REQST_USER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SYS0047M H ON H.USER_ID = B.APPV_1_USER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SYS0047M I ON I.USER_ID = B.APPV_2_USER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SYS0047M J ON J.USER_ID = A.APPV_3_USER_ID WHERE A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.STOCK_AUDIT_NO = #{stockAuditNo} AND B.WH_LOC_ID = #{whLocId}
mapper.update: /* [com.coway.trust.biz.logistics.adjustment.impl.CountStockAuditMapper.clear1stApprovalDoc] 20191014 - KR OHK */ UPDATE LOG0094M SET APPV_3_REQST_USER_ID = '' ,APPV_3_REQST_DT = '' ,APPV_3_REQST_OPINION = '' ,APPV_3_USER_ID= '' ,APPV_3_DT= '' ,APPV_3_OPINION= '' ,UPD_USER_ID = #{userId} ,UPD_DT = SYSDATE WHERE STOCK_AUDIT_NO = #{stockAuditNo}
mapper.select: /* [com.coway.trust.biz.logistics.adjustment.impl.CountStockAuditMapper.selectOtherReasonCodeList] 20191118 - KR OHK */ SELECT CODE ,CODE_NAME ,IND FROM SYS0094M WHERE IND IN ('DED_RSN', 'O_GI_RSN', 'O_GR_RSN') AND DISB = 0 ORDER BY IND, CODE

/* [com.coway.trust.biz.logistics.adjustment.impl.CountStockAuditMapper.selectAttachmentFileInfo] 20191014 - KR OHK */ SELECT T1.ATCH_FILE_GRP_ID ,T1.ATCH_FILE_ID ,T2.ATCH_FILE_NAME ,T2.FILE_SUB_PATH ,T2.PHYSICL_FILE_NAME ,T2.FILE_EXTSN ,T2.FILE_SIZE FROM SYS0070M T1 LEFT JOIN SYS0071D T2 ON T1.ATCH_FILE_ID = T2.ATCH_FILE_ID WHERE T1.ATCH_FILE_GRP_ID = #{atchFileGrpId}
